Todos los días yo era cocinero.
Every day i was a cook.

A esa hora tú fuiste estudiante.
(tú) At that hour you were a student.

Todas las mañanas tú eras dentista.
(tú) Every morning you were a dentist.

Todos los años nosotros éramos dentistas.
Todas las mañanas él era dentista.
Every morning he was a dentist.

Él me dijo que ellas eran dentistas.
He told me that they were dentists.
